title: About
text:
Hi, Iâ€™m Aryan Lokagariwar â€” a Business Analytics student who loves turning messy data into sharp decisions.
Iâ€™ve worked across:

Scalable analytics with PySpark (SQL/DataFrames, MLlib) on AWS EC2

Decision support & simulation (optimization, sensitivity analysis)

Storytelling for impact â€” clear visuals, concise narratives, and executive summaries



Focus Areas

Predictive & Prescriptive Analytics: regression & classification at scale; linear and integer optimization for allocation and pricing

ETL & Data Modeling: schema design, partitioning, and performance tuning

Visualization: Plotly, Quarto, Power BI; dashboard design principles




Tools
Python Â· PySpark Â· Pandas Â· SQL Â· AWS EC2 Â· Git/GitHub Â· Power BI Â· Quarto



Currently

Advancing Spark ML workflows and reproducible, Quarto-based reporting.

Delivering a simulation-driven Managerial Report (multi-part) on an in-house microbrewery business case (AD715).


Iâ€™m actively seeking roles in data science / analytics (risk, pricing, operations, ML) where I can ship reliable insights at scale.

title: Projects
text:
::: {.row g-4}

::: {.card shadow}  ::: {.card-body} ### Lightcast Job Market Analytics
Explored a large job-postings dataset with PySpark SQL & DataFrames. Built pipelines for cleaning, deduplication, salary normalization, and skills trend analysis. Produced Quarto-based narratives and reproducible notebooks.
Stack: PySpark, SQL, Quarto, GitHub Pages
Repo: https://github.com/met-ad-688/assignment-03-ar3573

::: :::

::: {.card shadow}  ::: {.card-body} ### In-House Microbrewery â€” Simulation & Optimization
Modeled pricing, capacity, and wholesale vs.Â retail strategy across FY1â€“FY3. Built NPV maximization with constraints, sensitivity analysis, and KPI/CSF dashboards. Delivered an APA-formatted managerial report with action items.
Stack: Python, Optimization, Power BI, Quarto
Artifacts: Executive brief, 36-month pro forma, KPI tables

::: :::

::: {.card shadow}  ::: {.card-body} ### Machine Learning on Scale (Spark ML)
Implemented regression and classification pipelines with MLlib (VectorAssembler, StringIndexer, Pipeline, CrossValidator). Emphasis on explainability, metric selection, and robust validation.
Stack: PySpark MLlib, AWS EC2, Quarto
Focus: Causal vs.Â predictive framing, model diagnostics
